com.facebook.buck.android

Class FilterResourcesStep

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.android.FilterResourcesStep
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Step

    public class FilterResourcesStep
extends Object
implements Step
    This Step copies res directories to a different location, while filtering out certain resources.
